name: Mount Guard
description: Checks /etc/fstab for defined mount points, remounts missing ones, and alerts via Gotify.
check_cmd: awk '!/^#/ && $3 !~ /^(proc|sysfs|devpts|tmpfs|cgroup|overlay|squashfs|zram|bpf|tracefs|autofs|fusectl|mqueue|debugfs|securityfs|hugetlbfs)/ {print $2}' /etc/fstab | while read m; do mountpoint -q "$m" || echo $m; done
fix_cmd: awk '!/^#/ && $3 !~ /^(proc|sysfs|devpts|tmpfs|cgroup|overlay|squashfs|zram|bpf|tracefs|autofs|fusectl|mqueue|debugfs|securityfs|hugetlbfs)/ {print $2}' /etc/fstab | while read m; do mountpoint -q "$m" || mount "$m" >/dev/null 2>&1 || true; done
verify_cmd: awk '!/^#/ && $3 !~ /^(proc|sysfs|devpts|tmpfs|cgroup|overlay|squashfs|zram|bpf|tracefs|autofs|fusectl|mqueue|debugfs|securityfs|hugetlbfs)/ {print $2}' /etc/fstab | while read m; do mountpoint -q "$m" || echo $m; done
notify_message: Missing mounts detected and remounted where possible.
